templates.title: Mission
templates.body-placeholder: Does everyone know what they’re fighting for? What is your mission?

templates.title: Values
templates.description: Core values the organization lives by
templates.body-placeholder: Core values are the fundamental beliefs of the organization. What are they, and why are they important?

templates.title: Diversity
templates.body-placeholder: What is the current state of diversity at your organization? What are your goals, and what needs to happen to achieve them?

templates.title: Competition
templates.body-placeholder: Who are the competitors you’re paying attention to? Why? What other big external threats do you see?

templates.title: CEO Update
templates.body-placeholder: Provide an overview of important happenings in the organization since the last update.

templates.title: Highlights
templates.body-placeholder: What new milestones or accomplishments are you most proud of?

templates.title: Growth
templates.description: Growth metrics and key performance indicators
templates.body-placeholder: Provide context about recent growth. Why are these metrics important? How are they performing against targets? What is impacting them?
templates.prompt:
Enter the most important growth metric for the stakeholders of your organization. You'll be able
      to add more later.

templates.title: Key Challenges
templates.body-placeholder: What are you most disappointed about, and what’s the plan to fix it? What threats should everyone be focused on?

templates.title: Key Takeaways
templates.body-placeholder:
What’s something you recently learned about your business, market, customers, or product?
      What changes are you making as a result?

templates.title: Team and Hiring
templates.body-placeholder: Announce and welcome new hires, discuss open positions and progress being made to fill them, and let everyone know about employees that have left.

templates.title: Product
templates.body-placeholder: What's shipped recently and how has the roadmap changed? How is the market responding? What’s working? What’s not?

templates.title: Customer Service
templates.body-placeholder: Is customer satisfaction trending up or down? How are you tracking it? What key issues do your customers have?

templates.title: Marketing
templates.body-placeholder: List any notable marketing activities since the last update. How are your current marketing efforts performing? Anything new planned?

templates.title: Press
templates.body-placeholder: List any notable press mentions since the last update. Provide an update on PR activities.

templates.title: Sales
templates.description: Notable sales activity and wins and losses
templates.body-placeholder: Did you close any notable sales? What opportunities are in the pipeline?

templates.title: Business Development
templates.description: Notable partnership activity and new deals
templates.body-placeholder: Did you close any notable deals / partnerships? What opportunities are in the pipeline?

templates.title: How You Can Help
templates.description: Ask your stakeholders for help and ideas
templates.body-placeholder: Where do you need the most help from your team and investors?

templates.title: Kudos
templates.description: Celebrate great actions that helped the organization
templates.body-placeholder: Who went above and beyond to help the organization? What did they do?

templates.title: Finances
templates.description: Cash on hand, burn and runway
templates.body-placeholder: What would you like to say about organization finances?

templates.title: Compensation
templates.description: Founder, executive and employee compensation practices
templates.body-placeholder: What thought process or formula do you use to determine pay and equity? Would you like to share high-level summaries or detailed information?

templates.title: Ownership
templates.body-placeholder: What would you like to share about ownership, such as the # of shares outstanding and size of the employee option pool? Is there a formula used to allocate options?

templates.title: Fundraising
templates.body-placeholder: When are you raising, and how much would you like to raise? How will you use the funds? Link to the pitch deck, and let everyone know how it’s going. If you’ve already raised, who are the new investors and what are the terms?
